name: Cubetastic (Maitreya Dwivedi)
description:
It's one of the most most simple games out there.

All you have to do is to avoid hitting the obstacles(or falling off the ground) and try to reach the end.

Currently there are only three levels, but the no. will be increased in the future updates. At the moment it is only available for Windows but a mac version will be out soon. It works on 32 as well as 64 bit computer's.

Don't think that it is an easy game

(WARNING: NO ONE HAS BEEN ABLE TO COMPLETE THE GAME)
